body_html:
Thanks. Now, if you replace
c = sess.run(tf.trace(tf.random_normal((4, 4), r, 1.0)))
with
c = np.sum(np.diag(np.random.normal(0.0, 1.0, (4, 4))))

in for loop of "Trajectory_Fun", the entire program runs in about 1 second.

body:
Thanks.  Now, if you replace  
c = sess.run(tf.trace(tf.random_normal((4, 4), r, 1.0)))
with
c = np.sum(np.diag(np.random.normal(0.0, 1.0, (4, 4))))

in for loop of "Trajectory_Fun", the entire program runs in about  1 second.
